name: Flashover MegaSector: Flash Edition
description:
NOTE: You need to click on the game first to skip the intro with Z if you want to do that!

This game was always made as a sendoff to Flash. It's only fitting that, when I wanted to use the Flash exporter of CF2.5 one last time, I decided I'd try to port this one.

It's the full game, compressed heavily to fit down in 8MB for authenticity to mid 2000's Flash games.

It has a few bugs that the PC version doesn't, and it may use the wrong font if you don't have the font it uses installed because I couldn't get Fusion to embed it. (If you want to install it, it's available here: Vegur | ドットコロン (dotcolon.net))

Additionally, some minor text bugs ended up cropping up and I have no idea how to fix them. Lastly, performance may be a bit iffy at times because it's a Flash port of a danmaku-ish game so it has a lot of bullets.

Those caveats out of the way, I hope you enjoy the most authentic-feeling version of the game I've ever made.

More info on Flashover MegaSector can be found here (PC version is free until the end of 2020!): Flashover MegaSector by Happy Frog Games (itch.io)

A keyboard is needed for gameplay and a mouse is needed for menus.
